headline: Citi is Neutral on Caesars (CZR) Due to Concerns Over Aggressive Promotions Replacing High-Margin Strategy
summary: Caesars Entertainment Inc. (NASDAQ:CZR) is one of the most promising stocks with huge upside potential. On November 21, Citi initiated coverage of Caesars with a Neutral rating and $23 price target. This sentiment surrounding the Neutral rating was announced as the firm believes that investors are concerned that Caesars Entertainment is replacing its high-margin strategy […]
